name: YChatSharp Library
short_description: YCS is an open Yahoo Chat and Messaging Protocol (YMSG) classlibrary written in C# on .NET 4.0 with client performance and scalability as a goal. The API facilitates quick and easy implementations of Yahoo chat clients with an event-based pattern.
